text: This is not possible as of now.

I mean you could setup a little if function to check a parameter that gets sent to the function. Like an APIKEY, check if they have the correct APIKEY if they do then process through the function like normal if they don't then don't process
Another way would be to restrict the function to only work with certain IP addresses (through another little `if`)
Currently there isn't a great built in way to do this yet but those couple of options aren't terrible
